events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but received the wrong size. I would like to return it and get a refund since the exchange process seems complicated.
The case was classified under 'Refund' based on customer's request for money back and return of the incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the incorrect jacket size.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. Sorry to hear about the sizing issue. I'd be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been opened or used? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 987654321. The jacket is unopened and still in original packaging, so it should be fine for return.
Thank you for the info! We will initiate a full refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. I'll email you the prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for your quick response and clear instructions! I appreciate the help.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. You should see the funds back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback is valuable and helps us improve our service.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey, rating the service experience as excellent and expressing thanks for the helpful support.
This support case has been archived by the system following standard retention policies.
